page.title: 04STENTON FRUIT FARM
page.content: {STENTON FRUIT FARM I live on a fruit farm which is probably the biggest in East Lothian . The summer is a hectic time, We have {strawberries, raspberries , black }and {red currants }and{gooseberries. }By 1986 we hope to have {brambles }and { {tayberries }. There is a shop for all the fruitpickers and a carpark and playground where every year we try to add something new . Mum says "July and August to us mean fruit . If the weather is right fruit comes before anything else from 8 in the morning until 10 at night " Good dry weather produces good fruit and people come from far and wide to pick it. Many of the local young people work on the fruit during their summer holidays I like all the fruits we have.
